      • updateGovernor

        public java.math.BigInteger updateGovernor(java.lang.String account,
                                           java.math.BigInteger weight)
                                    throws ContractException
        apply for update governor, only governor can call it
        参数:
        account - new governor address
        weight - 0 == delete, bigger than 0 == update or insert
        返回:
        proposalId
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • setRate

        public java.math.BigInteger setRate(java.math.BigInteger participatesRate,
                                    java.math.BigInteger winRate)
                             throws ContractException
        apply set participate rate and win rate. only governor can call it
        参数:
        participatesRate - [0,100]. if 0, always succeed.
        winRate - [0,100].
        返回:
        proposalId
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • setDeployAuthType

        public java.math.BigInteger setDeployAuthType(AuthType deployAuthType)
                                       throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of setting deploy contract auth type, only governor can call it
        参数:
        deployAuthType - 1-whitelist; 2-blacklist
        返回:
        proposalId
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • getDeployAuthType

        public java.math.BigInteger getDeployAuthType()
                                       throws ContractException
        get global deploy auth type
        返回:
        deployAuthType
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • modifyDeployAuth

        public java.math.BigInteger modifyDeployAuth(java.lang.String account,
                                             java.lang.Boolean openFlag)
                                      throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of adding deploy contract auth for account, only governor can call it
        参数:
        account - account address string
        openFlag - true-open; false-close
        返回:
        proposalId
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • resetAdmin

        public java.math.BigInteger resetAdmin(java.lang.String newAdmin,
                                       java.lang.String contractAddr)
                                throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of resetting contract admin, only governor can call it
        参数:
        newAdmin - admin address
        contractAddr - the address of contract which will propose to reset admin
        返回:
        proposalId
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • createRmNodeProposal

        public java.math.BigInteger createRmNodeProposal(java.lang.String node)
                                          throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of remove consensus node, only governor can call it
        参数:
        node - node ID
        返回:
        proposal ID
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • createSetConsensusWeightProposal

        public java.math.BigInteger createSetConsensusWeightProposal(java.lang.String node,
                                                             java.math.BigInteger weight,
                                                             boolean addFlag)
                                                      throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of set consensus node weight, only governor can call it
        参数:
        node - node ID
        weight - consensus weight: weigh bigger than 0, sealer; weight = 0, observer
        addFlag - flag to distinguish add a node or set node's weight,
        返回:
        proposal ID
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • createSetSysConfigProposal

        public java.math.BigInteger createSetSysConfigProposal(java.lang.String key,
                                                       java.lang.String value)
                                                throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of set system config, only governor can call it
        参数:
        key - system config key, only support (tx_gas_limit,tx_count_limit,consensus_leader_period)
        value - system config value, notice that tx_gas_limit bigger than 100,000, tx_count_limit bigger than 1, consensus_leader_period bigger than 1
        返回:
        proposal ID
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • createUpgradeVoteComputerProposal

        public java.math.BigInteger createUpgradeVoteComputerProposal(java.lang.String address)
                                                       throws ContractException
        submit a proposal of upgrade vote computer logic contract, only governor can call it
        参数:
        address - vote computer address
        返回:
        proposal ID
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

        返回:

        参数:
        proposalId - id
        callback - callback when get receipt

      • voteProposal

        public TransactionReceipt voteProposal(java.math.BigInteger proposalId,
                                       java.lang.Boolean agree)
        unified vote, only governor can call it
        参数:
        proposalId - id
        agree - true or false
        返回:
        transaction receipt

      • asyncVoteProposal

        public void asyncVoteProposal(java.math.BigInteger proposalId,
                              java.lang.Boolean agree,
                              TransactionCallback callback)
        async unified vote, only governor can call it
        参数:
        proposalId - id
        agree - true or false
        callback - callback when get receipt

      • getProposalInfo

        public ProposalInfo getProposalInfo(java.math.BigInteger proposalId)
                             throws ContractException
        get proposal info
        参数:
        proposalId - proposal id
        返回:
        return ProposalInfo {id, proposer, proposalType, blockNumberInterval, status, address[] agreeVoters, address[] againstVoters }
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • getProposalInfoList

        public java.util.List<ProposalInfo> getProposalInfoList(java.math.BigInteger from,
                                                        java.math.BigInteger to)
                                                 throws ContractException
        get proposal info list, range in [from,to]
        参数:
        from - begin proposal id
        to - end proposal id
        返回:
        return ProposalInfo list {id, proposer, proposalType, blockNumberInterval, status, address[] agreeVoters, address[] againstVoters }[]
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • checkDeployAuth

        public java.lang.Boolean checkDeployAuth(java.lang.String account)
                                  throws ContractException
        check the account whether this account can deploy contract
        参数:
        account - the account to check
        返回:
        true or false
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • checkMethodAuth

        public java.lang.Boolean checkMethodAuth(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                                         byte[] func,
                                         java.lang.String account)
                                  throws ContractException
        check the contract interface func whether this account can call
        参数:
        contractAddress - the contractAddress
        func - interface func selector of contract, 4 bytes
        account - the account to check
        返回:
        true or false
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • getMethodAuth

        public Tuple3<AuthType,java.util.List<java.lang.String>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getMethodAuth(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                                                                                                        byte[] func)
                                                                                                 throws ContractException
        get auth of specific contract's method func
        参数:
        contractAddress - contract address
        func - method interface func selector, contains 4 bytes: hash(selector()).getBytes(0,4)
        返回:
        get a tuple of values: method auth type, access account list, block account list
        抛出:
        ContractException - AuthType.valueOf will throw this exception

      • getAdmin

        public java.lang.String getAdmin(java.lang.String contractAddress)
                          throws ContractException
        get a specific contract admin
        参数:
        contractAddress - the contract to get admin
        返回:
        admin address
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • setMethodAuthType

        public RetCode setMethodAuthType(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                                 byte[] func,
                                 AuthType authType)
                          throws ContractException
        set a specific contract's method auth type, only contract admin can call it
        参数:
        contractAddress - the contract address to set auth
        func - interface func selector of contract, 4 bytes
        authType - white_list or black_list
        返回:
        set result, 0 is success
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • asyncSetMethodAuthType

        public void asyncSetMethodAuthType(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                                   byte[] func,
                                   AuthType authType,
                                   PrecompiledCallback callback)
        async set a specific contract's method auth type, only contract admin can call it
        参数:
        contractAddress - the contract address to set auth
        func - interface func selector of contract, 4 bytes
        authType - white_list or black_list
        callback - callback when get receipt

      • setMethodAuth

        public RetCode setMethodAuth(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                             byte[] func,
                             java.lang.String account,
                             boolean isOpen)
                      throws ContractException
        set a specific contract's method ACL, only contract admin can call it
        参数:
        contractAddress - the contract address to set acl
        func - interface func selector of contract, 4 bytes
        account - the account to set
        isOpen - if open, then white_list type is true, black_list is false; if close, then white_list type is false, black_list is true;
        返回:
        set result, 0 is success
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • asyncSetMethodAuth

        public void asyncSetMethodAuth(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                               byte[] func,
                               java.lang.String account,
                               boolean isOpen,
                               PrecompiledCallback callback)
        async set a specific contract's method ACL, only contract admin can call it
        参数:
        contractAddress - the contract address to set acl
        func - interface func selector of contract, 4 bytes
        account - the account to set
        isOpen - if open, then white_list type is true, black_list is false; if close, then white_list type is false, black_list is true;
        callback - callback when get receipt

      • setContractStatus

        public RetCode setContractStatus(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                                 boolean isFreeze)
                          throws ContractException
        set a contract status, freeze or normal, only contract manager can call
        参数:
        contractAddress - contract address
        isFreeze - is freeze or normal
        返回:
        0 is success, otherwise is error
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • asyncSetContractStatus

        public void asyncSetContractStatus(java.lang.String contractAddress,
                                   boolean isFreeze,
                                   PrecompiledCallback callback)
        async set a contract status, freeze or normal, only contract manager can call
        参数:
        contractAddress - contract address
        isFreeze - is freeze or normal
        callback - callback when get receipt

      • contractAvailable

        public java.lang.Boolean contractAvailable(java.lang.String contractAddress)
                                    throws ContractException
        check contract is available, if normal then return true
        参数:
        contractAddress - contract address
        返回:
        if true, then this contract can be called
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception

      • proposalCount

        public java.math.BigInteger proposalCount()
                                   throws ContractException
        get proposal count
        返回:
        count
        抛出:
        ContractException - throw when contract exec exception
